Candidate.Name: Gabriel Johan
Candidate.Description: - Was really nervous. - Specialises in Neurological diseases. - No close friends
Candidate.background: Lost wife and daughter in a tragic house break-in about six years ago. He finds it hard to get close to people due to this trauma. He now supports a child orphanage charity to help support children who has no family as he has lost his Spends his personal time looking at family photos and reliving his old happy memories. A man trapped in his past but with no ill-intent.

Candidate.Name: Jessica Chang
Candidate.Description: - Raised in a strict environment in China. - Workaholic and Unmarried. - Lives in a fairly small home
Candidate.background: She has a tendency to resort to violence on animals to relieve her stress. She sometimes loses control and abuses her family members when they do see each other as she can be quite fierce with them. She also obtains drugs illegally to help deal with her out breaks (ADDERAll) Her life is wasted away as all her money goes towards drugs which barely keep her stable.

Candidate.Name: Thomas Reid
Candidate.Description: - Became a composer officially at 18. - Composes music in many genres. - Has made a name for himself in the industry.
Candidate.background: Is a workaholic and very obsessive with his work to a fault. Is a perfectionist and will do any means possible to create the perfect piece, including aggressively bossing those who work under him as well as collaborators and makes everyone work overtime with no exceptions. (Is not sympathetic and understanding towards others?)

Candidate.Name: Scott MacLeod
Candidate.Description: - Lives with his 11yo son. Wife passed away last year. - Childhood was not exactly great. - Thinks that everybody should know about and appreciate Arts.

Candidate.Name: Tara Williams
Candidate.Skills: Retail shopping, schmoozing, Organising charity events
Candidate.Description: - Comes from an extremely wealthy family. - Loves shopping, hosting dinner parties and even occasionally hosting charity events. - Is a Commerce-Law student.

Candidate.Name: Landon Ortega
Candidate.Description: - Believes he can do anything, can deal with any repair jobs. - Only has had one job. Forced to work by the book. - Sometimes gets ahead of himself and makes unrealistic designs.
Candidate.background: Although his ideas may not always seem to be grounded in real in-use solutions Landon thoroughly researches his ideas. He makes careful calculations to reduce the risk of their failure, but without actually having tested them practically there is no absolute guarantee they will work. Taking a chance on a guy like Landon could lead to great technological advancements, but great reward only comes from taking big risks.

Candidate.Name: Asuna Touyama
Candidate.Description: - Has criminal theft record. - Has attended multiple sessions with a psychiatrist to deal with anger issues. - Works diligently and efficiently at work.

Candidate.Name: Louis Dubois
Candidate.Description: - World renowned chef with multiple restaurant chains around the world - Popular with the ladies - Girlfriend (Miranda) died in a serial killing case recently
Candidate.background: Actually a serial killer, not satisfied with just killing and cooking animals He actually killed his ex girlfriend

Candidate.Name: Sara Van Haver
Candidate.Description: - Spends all her time taking care of her 2 young children, Tommy and Lara - She used to be a primary school teacher at her local school - Used to be with her husband a lot, but now he's nowhere to be seen

Candidate.Name: Francis Smith
Candidate.Description: - Is a professional software engineer, spends most of his time playing games. - Has shown glimpses of brilliance in his work. - Has the potential to create ground breaking products.
Candidate.background: Is unmotivated to do normal work, spends most of his time playing games instead. Has a secret side project which has the ability to compile huge amounts of data on loanees to a large bank, and potentially wipe that debt.

Candidate.Name: Anzio Romano
Candidate.Description: - Works at a software company as an in-house tester/debugger. - Recently purchased a luxurious house. - His co-workers say he's hard to work with.
